TopicTitle: Easiest rendezvous guide. Watch now, dock in 10 minutes.

Articles.Content:
The most straight-forward guide with no techno-jargon or wasted time.

If you couldn't rendezvous before, you will now.

The title sounds pretty arrogant to me and I'm sure you haven't looked at every other docking tutorial so there's no way you can know that this is actually the easiest.

Also you do it pretty much in the most inefficient way there is and you are only explaining how to do a rendezvous and not how to dock, which are totally different things.
I kinda like it, it's how I do it

The title sounds pretty arrogant to me and I'm sure you haven't looked at every other docking tutorial so there's no way you can know that this is actually the easiest.

Also you do it pretty much in the most inefficient way there is and you are only explaining how to do a rendezvous and not how to dock, which are totally different things.

I looked at every single one.

Nice tutorial!

Thank you. Keep on kerbaling!
As said: easy rdv (far less complicated that the optimal approach ), the only bad things in this video is the fast camera travelling/moving... without mentioning the "music" at the end

Not the way I do it but it is very straight forward and taught me a thing or two.

Good Job

Exactly how i do it!

You are a simple clever man!

Congratulations, this tutorial didn't work at ALL for me. The closest it got me was a direct collision course with my station. Not a docking collision course, but a messy explosive collision course. I eventually gave up after trying throughout 10-20 different quicksaves.

Congratulations, this tutorial didn't work at ALL for me. The closest it got me was a direct collision course with my station. Not a docking collision course, but a messy explosive collision course. I eventually gave up after trying throughout 10-20 different quicksaves.

Congratulations! You had what we call an unexpected rapid rendezvous.

Did you have your navball in target mode?

The title sounds pretty arrogant to me and I'm sure you haven't looked at every other docking tutorial so there's no way you can know that this is actually the easiest.

Also you do it pretty much in the most inefficient way there is and you are only explaining how to do a rendezvous and not how to dock, which are totally different things.

He said in the video this wasn't the most efficient way. But it looks a lot easier. I thought this was a pretty cool video. I learned a lot.

Thanks for the vid!
